pages.text: Urban areas mainly consist of high-rises and recreational spaces. Some buildings have food on display both from the mod and from vanilla Minecraft.$(br2)This list goes into further detail about certain buildings from specific Rider series.

pages.title: Narumi Detective Office
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider W (2009, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)6 gold $(l:w/items/unrefined_memory_g)Unrefined Memories$(/l), 5 silver $(l:w/items/unrefined_memory_s)Unrefined Memories$(/l), and 1 $(l:misc/items/music_discs#w_b_x_w_boiled_xtreme_music_disc)W-B-X ~W-Boiled Extreme~ Music Disc$(/l) (in barrels in the underground bunker)

pages.title: Donut Shop Hungry
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Wizard (2012, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)12 $(l:misc/items/foods#donut)Donuts$(/l), 2 $(l:misc/items/foods#vienna_coffee)Vienna Coffee$(/l), and 1 $(l:misc/items/foods#mayo)Mayo$(/l) (in a chest)$(li)2 $(l:misc/items/foods#donut)Donuts$(/l) and 1 $(l:misc/items/foods#vienna_coffee)Vienna Coffee$(/l) (on display)

pages.title: Nascita
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Build (2017, TV show)$(br2)Loot:$(li)4 $(l:misc/items/foods#coffee)Coffee$(/l) (on display)$(li)5 $(l:build/items/full_bottle)Empty Bottles$(/l) and 5 $(l:build/items/smash_bottle)Smash Bottles$(/l) (in a barrel in Sento's lab)
